faq.answer: Breathe is a scent branding & aroma diffusion platform for retail, hospitality and workplaces. We provide diffusers, scent design, and subscription fragrance programs.
Visit the products page to view models and request a quote.
We offer professional installation for commercial deployments. Request an installation quote via the Contact page.
Pricing depends on model and volume. Request a custom quote on the Contact page or email sales@breathe.com.
We offer demo units and sample scent cards for qualified customers — contact sales to arrange a trial.
Our products include a limited warranty. For support, open a ticket via the Contact page or email support@breathe.com.

troubleshoot.answer: Check power connection, confirm the unit is plugged in, and try a different outlet. If battery-based, check battery health.
Ensure the fragrance reservoir is filled, clean the atomizer, and increase the intensity setting in the admin console.
Turn off the unit immediately, clean the spill with a cloth, and inspect seals. Contact support with photos for further help.
Some units have a low hum. If the noise is new or loud, power cycle the device and inspect for debris around the fan/atomizer.
Check network credentials and ensure the device is within Wi-Fi range. For corporate networks, verify firewall and proxy settings.

diffuserQuotes.text: A calm mind begins with a breath of lavender. Great for wellness spaces and bedrooms.
Citrus lifts mood; diffuse in mornings for clarity and energy in retail environments.
Vetiver grounds a space — ideal for hospitality lobbies and executive suites.
A bespoke floral signature helps create a memorable brand impression for guests.
Subtle linen notes convey freshness — useful in boutiques and healthcare settings.
